com.soa.policy.wspolicy

Class XmlAssertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.policy.wspolicy.AbstractAssertion
      • com.soa.policy.wspolicy.AbstractSubPolicyAssertion
        • com.soa.policy.wspolicy.XmlAssertion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assertion, SubPolicyAssertion

    public class XmlAssertion
extends AbstractSubPolicyAssertion
    An assertion whose contents remain in a DOM-based format. This assertion is useful as a general purpose assertion that can be used in a variety of policy domains. This assertion does not attempt to understand its contents, which it considers domain specific. Additionally, this assertion may have sub-policy, but sub-policy is not required.
